description: This file defines the RegisterScreen widget for the Flutter frontend of a healthcare management system, implementing user registration with form validation and interaction with an AuthProvider for backend communication.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the user registration screen.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the registration form, its validation, and submission logic.

methods.name: _RegisterScreenState.dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the text controllers when the widget is removed to free resources.

methods.name: _RegisterScreenState._onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls the registration method from AuthProvider, and displays error messages if registration fails.

methods.name: _RegisterScreenState.build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the registration form, including input fields and the submit button.
